fields.headline: Pick of the week: Dance
fields.bodyText: The National Ballet Of China: Raise The Red Lantern Royal Opera House, WC2 Saturday 2 Epic, image saturated staging of Zhang Yimou's film classic, Raise the Red Lantern. The Guangdong Acrobatic Company: Chinese Acrobatic Swan Lake Royal Opera House, WC2 Tuesday 5 to Friday 8 Promises to be the most extravagantly surprising Swan Lake in ages, with swans on rollerskates and Odette dancing on top of Siegfried's head. ArTELIER: Kaleidoscope Bridewell Theatre, EC4 Saturday 2 Mixed programme of new modern dance created by six London-based choreographers.
